buenos.text: He ido algunas veces a almorzar, y tiene un menú ejecutivo con buenas opciones y platos abundantes.
Muy buen lugar, lo unico para criticarle es que lo mozos podrían ser mas amables.

The empanadas were very good and cooked to perfection.  Decor was plain but open and airy.  The waiter was unfriendly and had too many churros up his rear end.  Would have been a better experience if he would have removed the churros and smiled.

excelentes.text: Excelente lugar, muy buena atencion, precios razonables y platos enormes. Lo recomiendo 100%
Exquisita pizza a la piedra NO precocida.-
